prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon that has a fierce look and vibrant colors.
I want a Pokemon with a reptilian body and striking red and blue scales.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a dinosaur with large wings and claws.
Make a powerful dragon-like creature with a tough exterior and sharp spikes.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous habitats with a striking color palette.
Design a fearsome dragon that combines agility with strength in battle.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies both ferocity and majesty in its appearance.
